mapper.select: SELECT QUESTION_ID, USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE FROM TBL_QUESTION WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT a.ANSWER_ID, a.USER_ID, a.ANSWER_TITLE, a.ANSWER_REGISTER_DATETIME, q.QUESTION_TITLE FROM TBL_ANSWER a INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION q ON a.QUESTION_ID = q.QUESTION_ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{id}

SELECT a.REPLY_ID, a.USER_ID, a.ANSWER_ID, a.REPLY_CONTENT, a.REPLY_REGISTER_DATETIME, b.ANSWER_TITLE, c.QUESTION_TITLE FROM TBL_REPLY a INNER JOIN TBL_ANSWER b ON a.ANSWER_ID = b.ANSWER_ID INNER JOIN TBL_QUESTION c ON b.QUESTION_ID = c.QUESTION_ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{id}
